dct_description_sm: by Janet Radway Stone ... [et al.] ; U.S. Department of the Interior, U.S. Geological Survey.
Relief shown by contours and spot heights.
Includes text, 2 index maps, 2 cross sections, 1 ancillary map and 2 diagrams.
